mapper.select: SELECT ADMIN_ID, ADMIN_NAME, ADMIN_TEL, TO_CHAR(ADMIN_BIRTH,'YYYY-MM-DD') AS ADMIN_BIRTH , ADMIN_EMAIL, GENDER_NUM , CASE WHEN GENDER_NUM = 1 THEN '남성' WHEN GENDER_NUM = 2 THEN '여성' ELSE '선택안함' END AS GENDER FROM ADMIN WHERE ADMIN_NUM= #{admin_num}
SELECT ADMIN_ID FROM ADMIN WHERE ADMIN_ID = #{admin_id} AND ADMIN_PW = CRYPTPACK.ENCRYPT(#{admin_pw}, #{admin_pw})
